13 std::string GasCompositions::getSubstance() const {

17 // used for calculating excess air in flue gas given O2 levels
18 double GasCompositions::calculateExcessAir(const double flueGasO2) {
19  calculateCompByWeight();
20  double excessAir = (8.52381 * flueGasO2) / (2 - (9.52381 * flueGasO2));
21  if (excessAir == 0) return 0;
22 
23  for (auto i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
24  calculateMassFlueGasComponents(excessAir);
25  auto const O2i = mO2 / (mH2O + mCO2 + mN2 + mO2 + mSO2);
26  auto const error = std::fabs((flueGasO2 - O2i) / flueGasO2);
27  if (error < 0.02) break;
28  if (O2i > flueGasO2) {
29  excessAir -= (excessAir * 0.01);
30  } else {
31  excessAir += (excessAir * 0.01);
32  }
33  }
34  return excessAir;
35 }
36 
37 // used for calculating O2 in flue gas given excess air as a decimal
38 double GasCompositions::calculateO2(const double excessAir) {
39  calculateCompByWeight();
40  calculateMassFlueGasComponents(excessAir);
41  return mO2 / (mH2O + mCO2 + mN2 + mO2 + mSO2);
42 }
43 
44 void GasCompositions::calculateCompByWeight() {
45  double summationDenom = 0;
46  for ( auto const & compound : gasses ) {
47  summationDenom += compound.second->compAdjByVol * compound.second->specificWeight;
48  }
49 
50  for ( auto & comp : gasses ) {
51  comp.second->compByWeight = (comp.second->compAdjByVol * comp.second->specificWeight) / summationDenom;
52  }
53 }
54 
55 double GasCompositions::calculateSensibleHeat(const double fuelTemp) {
56  double specificHeatFuel = 0;
57  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
58  specificHeatFuel += comp.second->compByWeight * (comp.second->specificHeat(520) / comp.second->molecularWeight);
59  }
60 
61  return 1 * specificHeatFuel * (fuelTemp - 32);
62 }
63 
64 double GasCompositions::calculateHeatCombustionAir(const double combustionAirTemp, const double excessAir) {
65  double o2Air = 0;
66  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
67  o2Air += comp.second->compByWeight * (comp.second->o2Generated / comp.second->molecularWeight);
68  }
69 
70  double mAir = o2Air / 0.231;
71  double mCombustionAir = mAir * (1 + excessAir);
72  double rAir = combustionAirTemp + 460;
73  auto const & O2 = gasses["O2"];
74  auto const & N2 = gasses["N2"];
75 
76  double cpCombustionAir = 0.231 * (O2->specificHeat(rAir) / O2->molecularWeight)
77  + 0.769 * (N2->specificHeat(rAir) / N2->molecularWeight);
78 
79  return mCombustionAir * cpCombustionAir * (combustionAirTemp - 32);
80 }
81 
82 double GasCompositions::calculateSpecificGravity() {
83  double summationNumerator = 0;
84  for ( auto const & compound : gasses ) {
85  summationNumerator += compound.second->compAdjByVol * compound.second->molecularWeight;
86  }
87  return summationNumerator / (22.4 * 1.205);
88 }
89 
90 double GasCompositions::calculateHeatingValueFuel() {
91  double heatValueFuel = 0;
92  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
93  heatValueFuel += comp.second->compByWeight * comp.second->heatingValue;
94  }
95  return heatValueFuel;
96 }
97 
98 double GasCompositions::calculateHeatingValueFuelVolume() {
99  double heatValueFuel = 0;
100  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
101  heatValueFuel += comp.second->compAdjByVol * comp.second->heatingValueVolume;
102  }
103  return heatValueFuel;
104 }
105 
106 void GasCompositions::calculateMassFlueGasComponents(const double excessAir) {
107  mH2O = 0, mCO2 = 0, mO2 = 0, mN2 = 0, mSO2 = 0;
108  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
109  mH2O += (comp.second->h2oGenerated * comp.second->compByWeight) / comp.second->molecularWeight;
110  mCO2 += (comp.second->co2Generated * comp.second->compByWeight) / comp.second->molecularWeight;
111  mO2 += (comp.second->o2Generated * comp.second->compByWeight) / comp.second->molecularWeight;
112  }
113  mO2 *= excessAir;
114 
115  auto const & N2 = gasses["N2"];
116  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
117  auto const & c = comp.second;
118  mN2 += ((c->o2Generated * c->compByWeight) / c->molecularWeight);
119  }
120 
121  mN2 = ((1 - 0.231) / 0.231) * mN2 + mO2 * (1 - 0.231) / 0.231 + N2->compByWeight;
122 
123  for ( auto const & comp : gasses ) {
124  mSO2 += comp.second->so2Generated * comp.second->compByWeight / comp.second->molecularWeight;
125  }
126 }
127 
128 void GasCompositions::calculateEnthalpy() {
129  auto const & H2O = gasses["H2O"];
130  auto const & CO2 = gasses["CO2"];
131  auto const & N2 = gasses["N2"];
132  auto const & O2 = gasses["O2"];
133  auto const & SO2 = gasses["SO2"];
134 
135  const double ppH2O = (mH2O / H2O->specificWeight) /
136  (mCO2 / CO2->specificWeight + mH2O / H2O->specificWeight + mN2 / N2->specificWeight
137  + mO2 / O2->specificWeight + mSO2 / SO2->specificWeight);
138 
139  hH2Osat = 1096.7 * pow(ppH2O * 29.926, 0.013);
140  tH2Osat = 36.009 * log(ppH2O * 29.926) + 81.054;
141 }
142 
143 double GasCompositions::calculateTotalHeatContentFlueGas(const double flueGasTemp) {
144  auto const & H2O = gasses["H2O"];
145 
146  const double hH2O = mH2O
147  * (hH2Osat
148  + 0.5 * ((H2O->specificHeat(flueGasTemp + 460) / H2O->molecularWeight)
149  + (H2O->specificHeat(520) / H2O->molecularWeight)) * (flueGasTemp - tH2Osat));
150 
151  std::array<std::tuple<std::shared_ptr<GasProperties>, const double>, 4> gasArray = {
152  {
153  std::make_tuple(gasses["CO2"], mCO2),
154  std::make_tuple(gasses["N2"], mN2),
155  std::make_tuple(gasses["O2"], mO2),
156  std::make_tuple(gasses["SO2"], mSO2)
157  }
158  };
159 
160  double result = 0.0;
161  for ( auto const & gas : gasArray ) {
162 // auto const & tup = gas;
163  auto const & c = std::get<0>(gas);
164  const double mass = std::get<1>(gas);
165  result += mass * (0.5 * ((c->specificHeat(flueGasTemp + 460) / c->molecularWeight) + (c->specificHeat(520) / c->molecularWeight)) * (flueGasTemp - 32));
166  }
167 
168  return hH2O + result;
169 }
170 
171 double GasFlueGasMaterial::getHeatLoss() {
172  compositions.calculateCompByWeight();
173  const double heatInFlueGasses = compositions.calculateSensibleHeat(fuelTemperature);
174  const double hCombustionAir = compositions.calculateHeatCombustionAir(combustionAirTemperature, excessAirPercentage);
175  const double hValueFuel = compositions.calculateHeatingValueFuel();
176  compositions.calculateMassFlueGasComponents(excessAirPercentage);
177  compositions.calculateEnthalpy();
178  const double totalHeatContentFlueGas = compositions.calculateTotalHeatContentFlueGas(flueGasTemperature);
179 
180  const double heatInput = heatInFlueGasses + hCombustionAir + hValueFuel;
181 
182  return (heatInput - totalHeatContentFlueGas) / hValueFuel;
183 }
